1845368.effect:
If your opponent controls a card: Until the end of this turn, both players can activate the following effect any number of times, but only once per Chain for by each player.
● If a card(s) is sent to your opponent's GY, except "Wind Surge" or Spells/Traps sent to the GY after resolving: You can target 1 of those cards; Set it to your field, also for the rest of this turn, you cannot Set cards with that same card type (Monster/Spell/Trap).
1845368.name: Wind Surge

1845366.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: You can Place this card in your opponent's Pendulum Zone face-up. This card's ATK and DEF is equal to the combined Pendulum Scales of all cards in both player's Pendulum Zones x 100.
1845366.name: Pendulum Rogue Scale
1845366.pendulum_effect: You cannot target or destroy cards in your Pendulum Zone with card effects. Once per turn: You can make this card's Pendulum Scale become 0 or 13. Once per turn, during your End Phase, if you do not control a Pendulum Monster: Destroy 1 card in your hand or on your field, except a card in your Pendulum Zone.

1845363.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects.
● Reveal 1 card in your hand; add 1 card with a different name from your Deck to your hand that specifically lists the revealed card in its text. During the End Phase, if you did not Summon a monster or activate a Spell/Trap Card with the same name as the revealed card, you lose 4000 LP.
● Target 1 face-up card on the field or in either GY; add 1 card with a different name from your Deck to your hand that specifically lists the target in its text. During the End Phase, if you did not Summon a monster or activate a Spell/Trap Card with the same name as the added card, you lose 4000 LP.
You can only activate 1 "Universal Port" per turn.
1845363.name: Universal Port

1845357.effect: Send 2 monsters with different names to the GY from your hand, Deck, and/or field, then if you control no Link Monsters, Special Summon up to 2 "Amazoness" Fusion Monsters with different names from your Extra Deck in Defense Position that list the sent monsters as material (This is treated as an Fusion Summon.), also if you did not send a card from your Deck to the GY by this effect, all "Amazoness" monsters you control gain 300 ATK and DEF for each Fusion Monster on the field. You can only use activate 1 "Amazoness Fusion" per turn. If an "Amazoness" Fusion Monster(s) you control leaves the field whil this card is in your GY: You can add this card to your hand. You cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Amazoness" monsters.
1845357.name: Amazoness Fusion

1845383.effect:
3+ Dragon Fusion Monsters with different names, including "Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon", "Blue-Eyes Alternative Ultimate Dragon", and "Neo Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon".
Must first be Fusion Summoned or Special Summoned from your Extra Deck by banishing the above cards you have Summoned this Duel from your field and/or GY. While you control no other cards on the field, this card is unaffected by other cards' effects and cannot be Tributed. This card cannot Attack directly. This card can attack a number of times each Battle Phase, up to the number of monsters used as Fusion Material +1. Once per turn: You can change 1 monster on the field to face-up Attack Position. During the End Phase, if this card was not Fusion Summoned: Send it to the GY.
1845383.name: Nonary Blue-Eyes Overdragon

1845360.effect:
1 Fusion Monster + 1 "Amazoness" monster you control
Must first be Fusion Summoned. This card cannot Attack if you have a monster on your field or in your GY that is not an "Amazoness" monster. During your Battle Phase or your opponent's turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation. You can only use this effect of "Amazoness Ancestress" once per turn. If this Fusion Summoned card you control is sent to your GY by an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 "Amazoness Empress" or "Amazoness Pet Liger" from your Extra Deck or GY in Defense Position.
1845360.name: Amazoness Ancestress

1845430.effect:
2 monsters with the same ATK but different names
This card's original ATK and DEF are equal to ATK of the monsters used as material while they were on field. While this card has material, it can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase, also it cannot Attack directly. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster on the field; double its ATK and DEF until the end of the next turn. If a monster is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can gain LP equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster while it was on the field. You can only Summon "Multiplyguy(s)" once per turn.
1845430.name: Multiplyguy

1845429.effect:
2 monsters with the same DEF but different names
This card's original ATK and DEF are equal to DEF of the monsters used as material while they were on field. While this card has material, monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster whose current ATK or DEF is different from their original ATK or DEF. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster on the field; halve its ATK and DEF until the end of the next turn. When an attack is declared involving a monster you control: You can gain LP equal to the DEF of your battling monster. You can only Summon "Divideguy(s)" once per turn.
1845429.name: Divideguy

1575863.effect: If your opponent takes effect damage: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Firewild" monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Firewild Lava Lynx", and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level x 100. You can only use each effect of "Firewild Lava Lynx" once per turn.
1575863.name: Firewild Lava Lynx

1575923.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Firewild" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Firewild Flaring Ferret", and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level x 100. If your opponent takes effect damage, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leave the field. You can only use each effect of "Firewild Flaring Ferret" once per turn.
1575923.name: Firewild Flaring Ferret

1575955.effect: When exactly 1 "Firewild" monster is Normal or Special Summoned to your field, except "Firewild Conflagration Coyote" (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's Level or Link Rating x 100. If your opponent takes effect damage by a "Firewild" card's effect, except by this card's effect: Target 1 Set card your opponent controls; destroy that target. You can only use each effect of "Firewild Conflagration Coyote" once per turn.
1575955.name: Firewild Conflagration Coyote

1576727.effect: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card, then target 1 face-up "Firewild" monster on the field; it gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn, and if it does, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level or Link Rating x 100. If you control a "Firewild" monster other than "Firewild Burning Bull" and this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Firewild Burning Bull" once per turn.
1576727.name: Firewild Burning Bull

1576084.effect: If a "Firewild" Link Monster you control attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent, also any battle damage inflicts to your opponent by this effect is treated as effect damage instead. If you control a "Firewild" Link Monster, while this card is in your GY: You can target 1 "Firewild" card in your GY, except "Firewild Torching Tiger"; shuffle that target into the Deck, and if you do,Special Summon this card to your zone a "Firewild" Link Monster points to, and if you do that, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the Link Rating of 1 "Firewild" Link Monster that points to this card. You can only use this effect of "Firewild Torching Tiger" once per turn.
1576084.name: Firewild Torching Tiger

1580072.effect: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to your zone a "Firewild" Link Monster points to, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the Link Rating of 1 "Firewild" Link Monster that points to this card. You can only Special Summon "Firewild Glowing Griffon" once per turn this way. If your opponent takes effect damage by a "Firewild" card's effect, except by this card's effect: Target 1 "Firewild" monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Defense Position, but its effects are negated, also, for the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except Pyro monsters. You can only use each effect of "Firewild Glowing Griffon" once per turn.
1580072.name: Firewild Glowing Griffon

1576910.effect: Activate 1 of these effects.● Add 1 "Firewild" monster from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level x 100.● Special Summon 1 "Firewild" monster from your GY to your zone a Link Monster points to, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the Link Rating of 1 "Firewild" Link Monster that points to the monster Special Summoned by this effect x 100.You can only activate 1 "Firewild Bonfire Burst" per turn.
1576910.name: Firewild Bonfire Burst

1578482.effect: Send 1 "Firewild" monster from your hand or field to the GY; draw 2 cards, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the sent monster's Level or Link Rating x 100. For the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except Pyro monsters. You can only activate 1 "Firewild Charring Claw" per turn.
1578482.name: Firewild Charring Claw

1576937.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Firewild" monster from your Deck to your hand. During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 Pyro monster, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) If this card in the Field Zone is destroyed by card effect: You can destroy 1 card on the field, then if the card destroyed by this effect was a monster, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's Level/Rank or Link Rating x 100. You can only activate 1 "Firewild Soot Savanna" per turn.
1576937.name: Firewild Soot Savanna

1590167.effect: Special Summon 1 "Firewild" monster from your Deck, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level x 100. If you control a "Firewild" Link Monster, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn. You can only activate 1 "Firewild Spark Sleep" per turn. If you control no cards, you can activate this card from your hand.
1590167.name: Firewild Spark Sleep

1576949.effect: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated while you control a "Firewild" Link Monster: Negate the activation, and if you negated a monster's effect, destroy that monster, and if you do that, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's Level/Rank or Link Rating x 100. If your opponent takes effect damage, while this card is in your GY: You can Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use 1 "Firewild Solar Storm" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1576949.name: Firewild Solar Storm

1576780.effect: 1 non-Link "Firewild" monsterIf this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Firewild" Spell/Trap from your Deck or GY to your hand. If a "Firewild" card(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead, then inflict 100 damage to your opponent for each card that would be destroyed. You can only use each effect of "Firewild Detonate Deer" once per turn.
1576780.name: Firewild Detonate Deer

1576815.effect: 2 Pyro monstersDuring your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Firewild" monster from your hand to your zone a "Firewild" Link Monster points to. (Quick Effect): You can target 2 cards (1 from each field); destroy them, then, if a "Firewild" monster you control was destroyed by this effect, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's Level or Link Rating x 100. You can only use each effect of "Firewild Volcano Vulcan" once per turn.
1576815.name: Firewild Volcano Vulcan

1576832.effect: 2+ Pyro monstersIf this card is Link Summoned: You can Set 1 "Firewild" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck, but it cannot be activated this turn. Each time your opponent takes damage by another "Firewild" monster's effect: This card gains 1 additional attack during each Battle Phase this turn (max. 2). During the End Phase, if this card is in your GY because it was sent there this turn: You can banish 1 other "Firewild" monster from your GY; Special Summon this card from your GY, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the banished monster's Level or Link Rating x 100. You can only use this effect of "Firewild Flaming Fenrir" once per turn.
1576832.name: Firewild Flaming Fenrir

1578574.effect: 3+ "Firewild" monstersMust be Link Summoned or Special Summoned by its own effect, and cannot be Special Summoned by other way. If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can destroy all cards your opponent controls, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the number of cards destroyed by this effect x100, also this card cannot attack this turn. While this card is co-linked to a "Firewild" Link Monster, neither player can target this card with card effects, also it cannot be destroyed by battle, while your LP are higher than your opponent's. While your LP are higher than your opponent's, this card gains ATK equal to the difference. While your LP are lower than your opponent's, this card loses ATK equal to the difference. During the next Standby Phase after this card was destroyed and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon this card from your GY.
1578574.name: Firewild Pyres Phoenix

1842217.effect: 2+ Pyro monstersWhen this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 Pyro Link Monster in your GY, except "Firewild Magmatic Maahes"; Special Summon it but negate its effects until the End Phase, also it cannot attack as long as it remains face-up on the field, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Link Rating x 100. Can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each, also monsters your opponent controls cannot attack, except to attack this card. Each time your opponent takes damage by another "Firewild" monster's effect: This card gains ATK equal to the damage they took. You can only control 1 face-up "Firewild Magmatic Maahes".
1842217.name: Firewild Magmatic Maahes

1681050.effect: You can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card from your hand or field; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except "Mecha Madness" monsters. When this card is Summoned: You can target 1 "Mecha Madness" monster you control; the Levels of both that monster and this card become the combined original Levels of those 2 monsters, until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Mu" once per turn.
1681050.name: Mecha Madness - Mu

1681055.effect: You can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card from your hand or field; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except "Mecha Madness" monsters. If this card is Tributed by, or to activate, the effect of a "Mecha Madness" card: You can Tribute 1 "Mecha Madness" monster from your hand. When this card is Summoned: You can target 1 "Mecha Madness" monster you control; the Levels of both that monster and this card become the combined original Levels of those 2 monsters, until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Nu" once per turn.
1681055.name: Mecha Madness - Nu

1679829.effect: You can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card from your hand or field; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except "Mecha Madness" monsters. If this card is Tributed by, or to activate, the effect of a "Mecha Madness" card: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card. If this card is Summoned: Add 1 "Mecha Madness" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Alpha" once per turn.
1679829.name: Mecha Madness - Alpha

1679916.effect: You can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card from your hand or field; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except "Mecha Madness" monsters. If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Mecha Madness" monster from your GY in Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Beta" once per turn.
1679916.name: Mecha Madness - Beta

1679924.effect: You can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card from your hand or field; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except "Mecha Madness" monsters. If this card is Tributed by, or to activate, the effect of a "Mecha Madness" card: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; it loses 1000 ATK. When this card is Summoned: You can Set 1 "Mecha Madness" Spell/Trap from your GY to your side of the field. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Gamma" once per turn.
1679924.name: Mecha Madness - Gamma

1680873.effect: You can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card from your hand or field; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except "Mecha Madness" monsters. If this card is Tributed by, or to activate, the effect of a "Mecha Madness" card: Special Summon 1 "Mecha Madness" card from your hand. When this card is Summoned: Target 1 "Mecha Madness" card in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Zeta" once per turn.
1680873.name: Mecha Madness - Zeta

1681030.effect: You can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card from your hand or field; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except "Mecha Madness" monsters. If this card is Tributed by, or to activate, the effect of a "Mecha Madness" card: Target 1 "Mecha Madness" card in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, then draw 1 card. If this card is Summoned: You can Tribute this card, then Special Summon 1 "Mecha Madness" monster from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Omicron" once per turn.
1681030.name: Mecha Madness - Omicron

1680870.effect: You can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card from your hand or field; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except "Mecha Madness" monsters. If this card is Tributed by, or to activate, the effect of a "Mecha Madness" card: Target 1 card on the field; negate its effects until the End Phase. If this card is Summoned: You can target 1 monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Delta" once per turn.
1680870.name: Mecha Madness - Delta

1680860.effect: When this card is activated: Add 1 "Mecha Madness" Monster from your Deck to your hand. If a "Mecha Madness" card is Tributed: You can draw 1 card. When a "Mecha Madness" Rank 6 or Rank 8 Xyz Monster is Xyz Summoned: Target 1 card on the field; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Homebase" once per turn.
1680860.name: Mecha Madness - Homebase

1680016.effect: You can target 1 "Mecha Madness" Xyz Monster you control; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 Machine Xyz Monster that is 2 Ranks higher than that target, by using that target as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to the Summoned monster.). You can banish 3 "Mecha Madness" cards from your GY; Set this card to your field. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Spiral Tower" once per turn.
1680016.name: Mecha Madness - Spiral Tower

1680934.effect: Banish any number of Machine monsters from your GY, then target 1 "Mecha Madness" Xyz Monster you control; Special Summon 1 "Mecha Madness" Xyz Monster that is a number of Ranks higher than that monster you control equal to the number banished x 2, by using it as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to the Summoned monster.) When a "Mecha Madness" card is Tributed, while this card is in your GY: You can add this card to your hand. You can only use 1 effect of "Rank-Up-Magic Mecha Madness - Upgrade" effect per turn, and only once per turn.
1680934.name: Rank-Up-Magic Mecha Madness - Upgrade

1680928.effect: 2 Level 4 "Mecha Madness" monstersYou can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card in your hand or field; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except Machine monsters. You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 "Mecha Madness" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but its effects are negated. When this card leaves the field: You can add 1 "Rank-Up-Magic Mecha Madness - Upgrade" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Omega" once per turn.
1680928.name: Mecha Madness - Omega

1680980.effect: 2 Level 6 "Mecha Madness" monstersCannot be destroyed by card effects. (Quick Effect): If a "Mecha Madness" card is Tributed: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up card on the field; negate its effects. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Draw 1 card. When this card leaves the field because of an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 Rank 4 or lower Machine Xyz Monster from your GY, then attach this card to that monster as material. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Theta" once per turn.
1680980.name: Mecha Madness - Theta

1679969.effect: 2 Level 8 "Mecha Madness" monstersThe first time this card would be destroyed by a card effect per turn, it is not destroyed. This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card and Tribute 1 "Mecha Madness" card from your hand or field, then target 1 card on the field; banish it. When this card leaves the field because of an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 Rank 6 or lower Machine Xyz Monster from your GY, then attach this card to that monster as material. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Epsilon" once per turn.
1679969.name: Mecha Madness - Epsilon

1680999.effect: 2 Level 10 "Mecha Madness" monstersCannot be destroyed by card effects. This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. Any battle damage your opponent takes from this card is halved. (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card and pay 1000 LP or discard 1 card, then Tribute 1 "Mecha Madness" card from your hand or field and target 2 cards on the field; banish that first target and if you do, negate the effects of the second target. When this card leaves the field because of an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 Rank 8 or lower Machine Xyz Monster from your GY, then attach this card to that monster as material. You can only use each effect of "Ultra Mecha Madness - Sigma" once per turn.
1680999.name: Ultra Mecha Madness - Sigma

1681484.effect: 1 non-Link "Mecha Madness" monsterIf this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can target 1 Xyz Monster you control; attach this card to that monster as material. You can only use this effect of "Mecha Madness - Tau" once per turn. An Xyz Monster whose original Type is Machine and has this card as material gains this effect.● This card gains 500 ATK.
1681484.name: Mecha Madness - Tau

1482378.effect: If this card is Special Summoned from the Deck, except by the effect of a "Prideful" card: You can Normal Summon/Set 1 "Prideful" monster, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn). You can banish this card from the GY; add 1 "Prideful" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Annie, The Prideful Mother" once per Duel.
1482378.name: Annie, The Prideful Mother

1474333.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Prideful" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Bianca, The Prideful Snake", or, if you control "Prideful Island Paradise", you can Special Summon that monster instead. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Prideful" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use 1 "Bianca, The Prideful Snake" effect per turn, and only once that turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, except "Prideful" monsters.
1474333.name: Bianca, The Prideful Snake

1708055.effect: If a "Prideful" monster is Normal Summoned to your side of the field: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Summoned: You can inflict 500 damage to your opponent. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Prideful" monster in your GY and 1 "Prideful" monster you control; Special Summon the first target, then return the second target to your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Cynthia, The Prideful Sorcerer" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, except "Prideful" monsters.
1708055.name: Cynthia, The Prideful Sorcerer

1708031.effect: If you control a "Prideful" monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand.) You can only Special Summon "Dominique, The Prideful Lover" once per turn this way. When this card is Summoned: You can gain 1000 LP. (Quick Effect): You can return 1 other "Prideful" card from your field to your hand, then target 1 card your opponent controls; return it to the hand. You can only use this effect of "Dominique, The Prideful Lover" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, except "Prideful" monsters.
1708031.name: Dominique, The Prideful Lover

1474354.effect: If this card is added from your Deck to your hand by the effect of a "Prideful" card: You can Special Summon this card. If this card is Special Summoned by its own effect: You can target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it. If this card is sent to the GY for the Summon of a "Prideful" monster: You can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Iris, The Prideful Rose" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, except "Prideful" monsters.
1474354.name: Iris, The Prideful Rose

1474545.effect: You can target 1 Spell/Trap you control; destroy it, then Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position. If another "Prideful" monster is Summoned, while you control this face-up card: You can add 1 "Prideful" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY for the Summon of a "Prideful" monster: You can target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Katherine, The Prideful Metal" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, except "Prideful" monsters.
1474545.name: Katherine, The Prideful Metal

1474756.effect: If your opponent targets a "Prideful" card(s) you control with a card effect (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Summoned: You can destroy 1 "Prideful" card in your hand. You can only use this effect of "Lyira, The Prideful Sunshine" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, except "Prideful" monsters.
1474756.name: Lyira, The Prideful Sunshine

1474534.effect: If you control no face-up monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Summoned, except by its own effect: You can add 1 "Prideful" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If a "Prideful" monster you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, while this card is in your GY, you can banish this card instead. You can only use each effect of "Sam, The Prideful Warrior" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, except "Prideful" monsters.
1474534.name: Sam, The Prideful Warrior

1474763.effect: Target 1 "Prideful" monster you control; add 1 "Prideful" monster from your Deck with the same Level as that targeted monster, but with a different original name than that monster. If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Prideful" monster from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Prideful Beautiful Sunshine" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn this card is Summoned, except "Prideful" monsters.
1474763.name: Prideful Beautiful Sunshine

1474576.effect: "Prideful" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF. Once per turn, if a "Prideful" monster is Normal or Special Summoned to your field: You can add 1 "Prideful" monster from your Deck with a different original name than that Summoned monster. If this card is destroyed by a card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Prideful" monster from your Deck in Defense Position, but its effects are negated. You can only activate 1 "Prideful Island Paradise" per turn, also you cannot Special Summon monsters the turn this card is activated, except "Prideful" monsters.
1474576.name: Prideful Island Paradise

Once per turn: You can tribute 1 "Dark Arts" monster you control; Special Summon up to 3 Level 6 or lower "Dark Arts" banished monsters, but negate their effects.
